data.name: Project Outbreak
data.detailed_description:
Project Outbreak is a brand-new take on wave-based zombie survival. Explore a variety of maps and build your arsenal of weapons and equipment. Uncover secrets, refine your strategy and climb the Steam leaderboards.

Fine-tuned FPS mechanics

We’ve strived to create weapons and movement mechanics which feel responsive and visceral.

Weapon Crafting and Progression

As you play, you’ll unlock new weapons and equipment blueprints. Using the materials found in each level, choose from your blueprints and craft your ever-growing arsenal of zombie-slaying gear!

Simple and Stylized Graphics

A simple but clean visual style allows the game to run and feel great even on a weaker system. No visual clutter or unwanted post-processing effects. Includes support for widescreen displays and an uncapped framerate.

Steam Leaderboards

Each map has its own high-score leaderboard, show your skill and keep playing until you reach the top.

High-Tension Gameplay

With a focus on tight map design and balanced difficulty, get right into the action without the boring early-game grind. Those zombies aren’t going to kill themselves!

data.short_description: Single-player Zombie slayer FPS carnage! Face the Zombie horde, craft your arsenal of weapons and claim the top rank on the leaderboards! Use everything to your advantage, do you have what it takes?
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
